description: URL encoding and decoding tests following RFC 3986 unreserved characters

tests.name: url_encode_space
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error

tests.name: url_encode_equals_ampersand
tests.comment: CyberChef does not encode = and & by default (RFC 3986 unreserved)
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error

tests.name: url_encode_percent
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error

tests.name: url_encode_at_sign
tests.comment: CyberChef does not encode @ by default
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error

tests.name: url_encode_plus_equals
tests.comment: CyberChef does not encode + and = by default
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error

tests.name: url_encode_hello_world
tests.comment: CyberChef does not encode commas by default, only spaces
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error

tests.name: url_encode_empty
tests.comment: Empty input should produce empty output
tests.skipReason: CyberChef string input handling broken - Invalid data type enum error
